body.p: The third page of the site creation wizard is the Installation page. This page is where you choose how to install the configured Feedback system. You can choose between three options:

dlentry.dt: Install Oxygen Feedback in WebHelp output generated from Oxygen XML Editor/Author
dlentry.dd: Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to WebHelp Responsive documentation AND you will generate the documentation using a transformation scenario in Oxygen XML Editor/Author.

dlentry.dt: Install Oxygen Feedback in WebHelp output generated from a command line
dlentry.dd: Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to WebHelp Responsive documentation AND you will generate the documentation using a command-line script.

dlentry.dt: Install Oxygen Feedback on any HTML-based website
dlentry.dd: Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to a website. When you select this option, an HTML fragment will be displayed. You need to copy this fragment and paste it into your HTML code for each webpage that you want to have the Feedback system embedded.
